name: Bullet Hell Reverence 1.8.9 (Slightly Unstable)
description:
Basically. This is probably one of the best stable versions, we have made. If we end up making a Version 3 or more, that'll probably be our final build for the system. Though, from what we can agree on. There isn't much we have to work on anymore, for the base.  

Feel free to use this for your play by post games, voice games, or anything else. We won't be working on a 2nd build anytime soon. So, this is our first official playable 1st game system build. Bullet Hell Reverence, for the win!

Cheers, Kagami and Prince Hades! :)
(The picture is not mine. All credit goes to the owner who made it.)
